Aug. 29, 1903 D Pontlottyn Contest
Pontlottyn Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
pontlottyn-contest
None
Gems of Welsh Melody
Pontlottyn, Glamorgan Prizes - 1st £10 and cornet, 2nd £7 and trombone, 3rd £4. March contest - 1st£1) Great Western Colliery. Best trombone - Lewis Merthyr. Best soprano, cornet, horn and euphonium - Great Western Colliery. 3 bands competed.
June 20, 2013, 12:49 p.m. Aug. 9, 2016, 9:25 a.m.
1 Great Western Colliery Silver J. H. Roberts
2 Lewis Merthyr Band Robert Dawson
3 Fochriw William Powell
